title: ambient sound cant be disabled
body: the ambient sound that persists through champ select, the loading screen, and the game. please let me disable.

replies.body: It's a known bug we are working on now. Seems to be happening when you leave the runes page and then save outside of Runes. To get it to stop playing, go back into Runes, click a page and then exit. It should stop playing! I'm working on getting a fix for this ASAP! Really sorry about it :/
OH THANK THE LORDS VONDERHAMZ! You are my savior.
